value.title: A Genius Strategy to a Dumb Challenge (Mouse ONLY)  | PiG's Lab - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: As part of PiG's Laboratory, I challenged pros to play with their mouse only (no keyboards!) to see what a pro StarCraft 2 game looks like with such a ridiculous rule.
